entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Unused using" incorrectly reported in IDE #67473
  • ToDisplayString for IParameterSymbol adds parameter name nomatter the settings (by default) #67464
  • Outlining - Collapse #regions on file open not working #67463
  • Settings search filter does not show all hits #67462
  • Syntax actions not always called in Roslyn 4.5.0 #67458
  • Iterator state machines frequently have unnecessary duplicate fields #67457
  • Async/iterator state machine <>1__state field can be smaller in most cases #67456

Closed

  • Compiler generates unused RefSafetyRulesAttribute type #67472
  • Stop silently adding 'using' directives when no auto-completion has been requested #67372
  • Incremental source generator hint name issue #57991
    17.6
  • CS8785 ForAttributeWithMetadataName issue with source generator #64841
    17.6
  • ForAttributeWithMetadataName in IIncrementalGenerator failing with ArgumentException #66451
  • `using static` doesn't work for extension methods #67438

PullRequests

Created

  • Change inline hint to inline hints #67475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove automatic background compiling/parsing in roslyn. #67474
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle arglist in GetValEscape #67471
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove concept of metadata assemblies that we dump to recoverable storage. #67470
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Nullable state of null coalesing assignment should inherit from nullable type #67468
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Document break for implicit locals of restricted type in async code #67466
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, 17.7
  • Attempt to repro issue 66960 #67465
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67460
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Catch user exceptions from source generator comparer #67459
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Gracefully handle unexpected NullableWalker state #67453
    Area-Compilers, 17.6

Merged

  • Add inline hints options to lsp #67455
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Don't trigger completion in argument list #67467
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update Building, Debugging, Testing instructions for VS #67451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Compute new brace-pair tags when the view is scrolled #67454
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove synchronous fire-and-forget mutation apis from TestWorkspace #67450
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Track state table removal due to input separately from removal due to selection #66643
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Checking escape characters when classification virtual character sequence #67444
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67452
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Add support in LSP code for hosting workspaces that don't keep an independent view of the current solution. #67443
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Preserve parent hoisted variables in nested async `catch` #67122
    Area-Compilers
  • Add net8.0 TFM to source-built packages #67333
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #67384
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Ignore file-local source declarations when searching for well-known types #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Allow nameof to access instance members. #48754
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2140648 #67418
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Run analyzers only for requested span #67236
    Area-Analyzers
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Add support for prioritized diagnostic computation requests in OOP #67392
    Area-Analyzers
  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • Reduce allocations based on light bulb experimentation #67203
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
